Name: FQ_Tailies_SolidarityNetwork
Description: Build a communication network between Tail cells. String wire through maintenance corridors to connect the resistance.

Objectives.Description: Collect 5 Wire Coils from Car 1-5 walls
String wire through 3 maintenance corridors
Test the network with all 4 cell leaders

Name: FQ_Tailies_ProteinBlockTruth
Description: Everyone eats them. Nobody asks what's in them. Find the production records and learn what the Tail has been consuming for seventeen years.

Objectives.Description: Find the protein block production manifest
Analyze the ingredient list (requires PER 10 or Marta)
Decide: reveal the truth or keep the secret

Name: FQ_Tailies_ChildrensWard
Description: Tail children are malnourished and scared. Organize a proper nursery with supplies, teaching, and protection.

Objectives.Description: Speak to Tanya about the children's needs (Car 4)
Collect 5 Protein Blocks for the children
Find blankets and warm clothing
Set up the nursery in Car 4

Name: FQ_Tailies_RevoltMemorial
Description: Build a memorial wall for those who died in previous revolts. Collect names and stories from survivors.

Objectives.Description: Interview 5 Tail elders about the revolts
Find the original memorial list (hidden in Car 14)
Build the memorial wall

Name: FQ_Tailies_CombatTraining
Description: Samuel needs fighters trained. Run combat drills in the Pit and prepare the Tail for war.

Objectives.Description: Meet Samuel at the training ground (Car 3)
Train 5 Tail recruits
Craft 3 weapons for the recruits
Pass Samuel's final combat test

Name: FQ_Tailies_TailsHope
Description: Organize a gathering to unite the Tail before the push forward. Music, stories, and shared protein blocks.

Objectives.Description: Convince 4 key Tail figures to attend
Gather food and drink for the gathering
Find a working instrument or radio
Attend the gathering and give a speech

Name: FQ_Union_FactoryConditions
Description: Document the working conditions in Third Class factories. Evidence is power.

Objectives.Description: Photograph 5 safety violations (Car 22)
Interview 3 injured workers
Deliver the report to Petra Kovic

Name: FQ_Union_ShiftRotation
Description: Workers are being forced into 16-hour shifts. Organize a fair rotation schedule without triggering Jackboot reprisal.

Objectives.Description: Map current shift schedules from 3 factories
Draft a fair rotation with Ivan Borodin
Implement the new schedule without alerting Jackboots

Name: FQ_Union_ToolLibrary
Description: Workers share tools through an underground lending system. Expand it by recovering confiscated equipment.

Objectives.Description: Locate the Jackboot confiscation warehouse (Car 26)
Recover 5 confiscated tool kits
Distribute tools to 3 factory sections

Name: FQ_Union_WorkerCouncil
Description: Form a democratic council to represent Third Class interests. Build consensus among divided factions.

Objectives.Description: Recruit 4 council representatives from different departments
Draft the council charter with Petra
Hold the founding vote

Name: FQ_Union_MutualAid
Description: Organize a mutual aid network between Third Class families. Share food, childcare, and medical supplies.

Objectives.Description: Survey needs from 5 Third Class families
Collect surplus supplies from willing donors
Distribute to families in need

Name: FQ_Union_StrikeBreaker
Description: A Jackboot agent is infiltrating the Union. Find them before they sabotage the strike from within.

Objectives.Description: Investigate 3 new Union members
Set a false information trap
Catch the infiltrator in the act
Decide the infiltrator's fate

Name: FQ_Jackboots_InsideMan
Description: A Jackboot officer offers information in exchange for protection. His superiors want him dead for knowing too much.

Objectives.Description: Meet the defector at the dead drop (Car 27)
Verify his intel against known patrol patterns
Protect the defector from 2 assassination attempts
Relocate the defector to a safe house

Name: FQ_Jackboots_ArmsCache
Description: Jackboot weapons are stored across multiple cars. Map their armories and sabotage their supply lines.

Objectives.Description: Locate 4 Jackboot weapons caches
Sabotage 2 supply routes
Steal weapons from a cache (optional)

Name: FQ_Jackboots_GreysGhost
Description: Commander Grey's personal enforcer is hunting revolutionaries. Track and eliminate the Ghost before they find you.

Objectives.Description: Investigate 3 disappearances linked to the Ghost
Set a trap using false intelligence
Confront the Ghost

Name: FQ_Jackboots_UniformSteal
Description: Jackboot uniforms grant access to restricted areas. Steal a set and maintain the disguise.

Objectives.Description: Find the Jackboot laundry car (Car 28)
Steal a uniform
Pass 3 Jackboot checkpoints in disguise

Name: FQ_Jackboots_PropagandaWar
Description: Jackboot loudspeakers blast Wilford's message daily. Hack the system to broadcast the truth.

Objectives.Description: Find the PA system control room
Record a revolutionary message
Hack the PA system (requires CUN 12 or Yuki)
Broadcast the message and escape

Name: FQ_Jackboots_DeserterNetwork
Description: Not all Jackboots believe in the cause. Build a network of sympathizers who will stand down when the revolution comes.

Objectives.Description: Identify 4 potential Jackboot sympathizers
Complete trust-building missions for 3 sympathizers
Establish the deserter signal system

Name: FQ_Bureau_FilingSystem
Description: Second Class runs on paperwork. Learn the bureaucratic system to gain access, forge documents, or expose corruption.

Objectives.Description: Study the filing system with a sympathetic clerk (Car 40)
File 3 fraudulent transit requests
Discover a corruption trail in the records

Name: FQ_Bureau_OkonkwosLaw
Description: The magistrate's legal framework is the only structure preventing total Jackboot rule. Study it to use it.

Objectives.Description: Read Okonkwo's published legal precedents (Car 48)
Attend 2 public hearings
Find a legal loophole that benefits the revolution

Name: FQ_Bureau_CensusReform
Description: The census undercounts lower classes. Correct the records to prove the scale of inequality.

Objectives.Description: Conduct an independent census in 3 zones
Compare with official records
Present discrepancies to Okonkwo

Name: FQ_Bureau_RedTape
Description: A bureaucratic backlog has trapped food shipments in processing. Cut through the red tape to release emergency supplies.

Objectives.Description: Find the stuck requisition forms (Car 41)
Get 3 approval stamps from different offices
Release the food shipments

Name: FQ_Bureau_WhistleblowerProtection
Description: A bureaucrat wants to expose Jackboot abuses but fears retaliation. Create a safe channel for testimony.

Objectives.Description: Meet the whistleblower in secret (Car 43)
Create a dead drop system for anonymous testimony
Collect 3 anonymous testimonies
Deliver the dossier to Okonkwo

Name: FQ_Bureau_JudiciaryIndependence
Description: Jackboots are pressuring Okonkwo to rig trials. Help her maintain judicial independence.

Objectives.Description: Find evidence of Jackboot pressure on the courts
Rally 3 Second Class citizens to support judicial independence
Confront the Jackboot officer pressuring the court

Name: FQ_Elite_AshworthAlliance
Description: Lord Ashworth represents the progressive wing of First Class. Build an alliance that bridges the class divide.

Objectives.Description: Attend Lord Ashworth's salon (Car 72)
Complete 3 favors for First Class progressives
Draft a shared governance proposal

Name: FQ_Elite_BeaumontNetwork
Description: Map Genevieve Beaumont's web of influence. Every First Class family owes her something.

Objectives.Description: Identify 4 families in Beaumont's debt
Find Beaumont's ledger of favors
Turn 2 families against Beaumont

Name: FQ_Elite_TheCollection
Description: First Class hoards pre-Freeze luxuries: art, wine, instruments. Catalog what exists and decide who deserves it.

Objectives.Description: Catalog 5 luxury hoards in First Class
Assess total resource value
Decide: redistribute, preserve, or trade

Name: FQ_Elite_ServantRebellion
Description: First Class servants are organizing quietly. Support their movement from inside the gilded cage.

Objectives.Description: Contact the servant organizer (Car 68)
Distribute pamphlets to 4 servant quarters
Coordinate the servant walkout timing

Name: FQ_Elite_GoldenAge
Description: First Class elders remember when the train launched. Document their version of history before it's lost.

Objectives.Description: Interview 4 First Class founding families
Cross-reference with Archive records
Discover the true boarding priority system

Name: FQ_Elite_PharmaceuticalControl
Description: First Class controls the train's entire pharmaceutical supply. Expose their monopoly on medicine.

Objectives.Description: Map the pharmaceutical supply chain
Find the pharmaceutical inventory records (Car 66)
Redirect a medical shipment to the Tail

Name: FQ_Order_InitiatesTrial
Description: Infiltrate the Order by posing as an initiate. Pass their tests to gain access to the inner sanctum.

Objectives.Description: Approach the Order recruitment station (Car 85)
Complete the Fasting Trial (survive 3 days without food)
Complete the Silence Trial (no dialogue for 1 hour)
Complete the Engine Trial (listen to the Engine hum)

Name: FQ_Order_HereticHunt
Description: The Order is hunting dissenters. Protect the reformers while maintaining your cover.

Objectives.Description: Learn about the heretic list from an Acolyte
Warn 3 targeted reformers before the Order reaches them
Plant false evidence to misdirect the hunt

Name: FQ_Order_EzrasVisions
Description: High Priest Ezra claims the Engine speaks to him. Investigate whether his visions are divine, chemical, or madness.

Objectives.Description: Attend one of Ezra's sermons (Car 95)
Collect air quality samples from the Engine corridor
Analyze samples (requires Dr. Min-jun or PER 12)
Decide what to do with the findings

Name: FQ_Order_SacredMachinery
Description: The Order worships specific engine components as relics. Map their theology to understand their defenses.

Objectives.Description: Study 4 sacred engine component shrines
Interview an Order theologian about component worship
Map the theological defense layout

Name: FQ_Order_ConfessionTapes
Description: The Order records all confessions. Find the tapes to reveal what the faithful fear most.

Objectives.Description: Locate the confession recording vault (Car 88)
Bypass the vault security
Listen to 5 key confessions
Decide: use as blackmail, expose, or destroy

Name: FQ_Order_FallenAcolyte
Description: A former Acolyte hides in the maintenance tunnels. She knows the Order's military plans but won't trust easily.

Objectives.Description: Find the fallen Acolyte's hiding place (Car 91)
Earn her trust through 3 conversations
Obtain the Order's military deployment plans

Name: FQ_Kronole_SupplyChain
Description: Map the Kronole trade network from production in the Tail to distribution across all classes.

Objectives.Description: Track Kronole from the production lab (Car 12)
Follow the courier route through 3 zones
Identify the First Class buyer

Name: FQ_Kronole_HarmReduction
Description: Zhora wants to reduce Kronole addiction without eliminating the trade. Help establish treatment protocols.

Objectives.Description: Consult with Zhora on treatment approaches
Collect 5 medicinal herbs for withdrawal treatment
Treat 3 addicts with the new protocol

Name: FQ_Kronole_GlassProphecy
Description: The Kronole Prophet Glass claims his visions reveal the future. Investigate whether his prophecies have basis in reality.

Objectives.Description: Attend Glass's prophetic ceremony (Car 12)
Record 3 specific prophecies
Verify prophecies against historical events

Name: FQ_Kronole_RivalDealers
Description: A new Kronole operation is cutting Zhora's supply. Shut them down or broker a merger.

Objectives.Description: Find the rival operation (Car 24)
Assess the rival's product quality
(Optional) Shut down the rival operation by force
(Optional) Negotiate a merger

Name: FQ_Kronole_CurrencySystem
Description: Kronole has become the train's shadow currency. Formalize the barter system to stabilize prices.

Objectives.Description: Survey prices at 4 Kronole trade points
Draft a standard exchange rate with Cora
Implement the rate at 3 major trade hubs

Name: FQ_Kronole_DetoxClinic
Description: Some addicts want out. Establish a treatment facility in cooperation with the Tail's medical resources.

Objectives.Description: Find a suitable location for the clinic (Car 8)
Collect medical supplies from 3 sources
Recruit medical staff (requires Marta)
Successfully treat 3 patients

Name: FQ_Thaw_TemperatureLog
Description: The Thaw Believers need hard data. Access exterior temperature records spanning years to prove warming.

Objectives.Description: Find the automated temperature station (Car 58)
Download 5 years of temperature data
Have Dr. Holst analyze the trend

Name: FQ_Thaw_ExteriorSurvival
Description: Build and test cold-weather gear for a controlled exterior walk. Prove humans can survive outside.

Objectives.Description: Craft a prototype cold suit (requires Yuki)
Test in the Freezer Breach car (Car 11)
Conduct a 5-minute exterior walk
Record survival data

Name: FQ_Thaw_SeedVault
Description: Somewhere on the train is a sealed seed vault. If the outside world is warming, seeds could mean agriculture.

Objectives.Description: Research the seed vault location in the Archive
Navigate to the hidden storage car (Car 60)
Verify seed viability (requires Rosa or PER 10)

Name: FQ_Thaw_RadioSearch
Description: Scan radio frequencies for signs of life outside the train. Any signal would change everything.

Objectives.Description: Access the communication array (requires Yuki or CUN 12)
Scan 5 frequency bands
Analyze any detected signals

Name: FQ_Thaw_ExodusPlanning
Description: If the Thaw is real, humanity needs an exit plan. Design the logistics of leaving the train.

Objectives.Description: Assess food supplies needed for 30-day exterior survival
Map potential settlement sites using exterior observation
Draft the Exodus plan with Kira Frost
Present the plan to revolution leadership

Name: FQ_Thaw_WilfordsLie
Description: Wilford has suppressed warming data for years. Find the original temperature records he hid.

Objectives.Description: Access Wilford's private data archive (requires Sanctum access)
Find the hidden temperature records
Compare with official records to prove suppression
